sentences: Ari David Starace (born July 27, 1994), professionally known as Y2K, is an American record producer and songwriter.
He is best known his 2019 single "Lalala" with Canadian rapper bbno$, which Y2K produced himself.
Y2K was introduced to music at an early age; his mother owned a music store in Arizona, which he has said was where his interest in music began.
According to Y2K, his introduction to music production was from California rapper, Lil B, who introduced him to Clams Casino.
Following this, Y2K began to work on music, making remixes exclusively for a few years before making the decision to start producing for others, such as bbno$, Yung Gravy and lil aaron.
